refnamediv.refpurpose: generate state space of an LPE

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The &lpe2lts; generates state space of the linear process equation (LPE) in &infile; and saves the result to &outfile; (in the aut format). If &outfile; is not present, the state space is not stored.

refsect1.title: Options
refsect1.para: The format of &outfile; is determined by its extension (unless it is specified by an option). If the extension is unknown, the aut format will be used.
